message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the special price, but $11,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it. What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $10,500?
